entities.modelContent: {"extendsType":0,"name":"SysUser","attrs":["loginCode: str // 登录名称\r","password: str // 密码\r","qqNo: str // qq号\r","adminFlag: int // 1为管理员,0为普通用户\r","status: int // 1为正常,2未激活,3锁定,0删除\r","lastLoginTime: long // 最后登录时间!\r","lastToken: str // 最后登录Token!\r","lastIp: str // 最后登录Ip!"]}
{"extendsType":0,"name":"SysUserLog","attrs":["userId > SysUser","action: int // 1登录,2登出","remark: str500 // 内容","token: str // 最后登录Token!","ip: str // 最后登录Ip!"]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiPlayer","attrs":["name!: str // 名字 ","state!: int2 = 1 // 玩家状态 0: 正常,1 新手,2 免战玩家,4: 被打完主城的玩家 ","playerGroup: int2 = 0 // 玩家组 0:正常玩家 1:GM 2: NPC ","gender!: int2 = 1 // 性别 1:男 2:女 ","lastCity!: int // 君主将最后所在城池 ","face!: str100 = '' // 脸ID ","flagChar!: str40 = '中' // 旗帜名称 ","playerRank!: int4 = 10000 // 排名 ","prestige!: long = 0 // 声望 ","warPrestige: long = 0 // 战场获得声望 ","warAttackPrestige: long = 0 // 战争进攻获得声望 ","warDefencePrestige: long = 0 // 战争防御获得声望 ","nobility: int4 = 0 // 爵位等级 ","officepos: int4 = 0 // 官职 ","unionId> GiUnion// 联盟ID ","unionPos: int4 = 0 // 联盟职位 ","money: long = 10000 // 元宝 ","armorColumn: int4 = 50 // 用户的装备栏数量 ","vipLevel: int2 = 0 // vip等级 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"MemWorldTile","attrs":["tileType: int2 // 格子地型：0:城池;1:平地;2:沙漠;3:森林;4:草地;5:高山;6:湖泊;7:沼泽; ","province: int2 // 州 ","jun: int2 // 郡 ","curLevel: int4 // 当前等级 ","maxLevel: int4 = 30 // 最大等级 ","ownerCityId>GiPlayer// 所属城池 ","state: int2 // 当前状态 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiCityBuild","attrs":["cityId> GiCity // 城池ID","bid> CfgBuild // 建筑ID","pos: int2 // 建筑位置","lv: int4 // 建筑等级 ","status: int2 = 0 // 0:正常,1:升级中,2:降级 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"MemCityBuildUpgrading","attrs":["buildId> GiCityBuild","status: int2 = 0 // :升级中,2:降级 ","addLevel: int2 = 1 // 操作等级 ","startTime: long // 开始时间 ","endTime: long // 结束时间 "]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"GiTechnic","attrs":["ownerId> GiPlayer","technicId> CfgTechnic","lv: int2 // 科技等级 ",""]}
{"extendsType":2,"name":"MemTechnicUpgrading ","attrs":["cityId> GiCity\r","technicId> GiTechnic\r","startTime: long // 开始时间 \r","endTime: long // 结束时间 "]}

{"extendsType":2,"name":"CfgDefence","attrs":["defenceType: int2 // 城防类型 6：陷阱 7：拒马 8：箭塔 9：滚木 10：雷石 ","name: s100 // 名称 ","description: s500 // 描述 ","hp: int4 // 生命 ","ap: int4 // 攻击 ","dp: int4 // 防御 ","apRange: int4 // 攻击范围 ","speed: int4 // 移动速度 ","carry: int4 // 载重 ","timeNeed: int4 // 招募耗时 ","woodNeed: int4 // 招募耗木材 ","rockNeed: int4 // 招募耗石头 ","ironNeed: int4 // 招募耗铁锭 ","foodNeed: int4 // 招募耗粮食 ","goldNeed: int4 // 招募耗金币 ","areaNeed: int4 // 招募耗城墙空间 "]}
